description:
Sly 2: Band of Thieves is a 2004 stealth action video game developed by
Sucker Punch Productions and published by Sony Computer Entertainment for
the PlayStation 2.

v0.1.0.description: Initial release of the Sly 2 Archipelago implementation. For setup instructions, check out the [README](https://github.com/NikolajDanger/APSly2/blob/main/README.md).
v0.1.0.title: v0.1.0 alpha

v0.1.1.description:
Sly 2 Archipelago implementation. For setup instructions, check out the [README](https://github.com/NikolajDanger/APSly2/blob/main/README.md).

## Changes:
- Small fix to client bottle handling
v0.1.1.title: v0.1.1 alpha

v0.1.2.description:
Sly 2 Archipelago implementation. For setup instructions, check out the [README](https://github.com/NikolajDanger/APSly2/blob/main/README.md).

## Changes
- ThiefNet purchase checks are now registered when the purchase is made.
- Bentley's deathlink works now.
- Disabled automatic skipping of the intro. If you still want to skip the intro, check out the [README](https://github.com/NikolajDanger/APSly2/blob/main/README.md).
v0.1.2.title: v0.1.2 alpha

v0.2.0.description:
Sly 2 Archipelago implementation. For setup instructions, check out the [README](https://github.com/NikolajDanger/APSly2/blob/main/README.md).

## Changes
### Bugs fixes
- Generator now provides proper errors when minimum is higher than maximum for coin amounts and ThiefNet costs.
- TOM and Mega Jump are now actually added to the item pool when enabled.
- Some of the situations in which ThiefNet doesn't properly update are fixed.
- Received items are no longer handled while in a cutscene. This should create no new problems, but fix a rare one.
- The Lighthouse Break-in and Boat Hack jobs are checked correctly now.
- The Ming Vase and Burial Urn treasures are checked correctly now.
- Fixed a bug where coin items sent before starting a game weren't received.

### Features
- ThiefNet checks now drip-fed into logic, as opposed to all being in logic to begin with. This should change nothing about the actual game-play, but the generation should create a much more open early game.
- "Include Vaults" option added. It is on by default.
- The ability to add an ungodly amount of Clockwerk parts into the item pool. The first 20 are unique, and the remaining will all be the "Clockwerk Feather" item. This feature has been added in part to prepare for a "Clockwerk Hunt" win condition, to be added.
v0.2.0.title: v0.2.0 alpha

v0.3.0.description:
Sly 2 Archipelago implementation. For setup instructions, check out the [README](https://github.com/NikolajDanger/APSly2/blob/main/README.md).

## Changes
### Bugs fixes
- Fixed issue where ThiefNet checks are sent without purchasing them.

### Features
- Added "Clockwerk Hunt" and "All Bosses" victory conditions.
- Added a `/clockwerk_parts` command, which shows how many Clockwerk Parts you currently have.
- ThiefNet checks are now sorted by cost, so the cheapest ones go into logic first.
- Each bottle is now an individual check if bottle check locations is set to 1.
- Bottle location and item bundle sizes can now be up to 30.
- The Clockwerk Part keys can now be set to unlock only the final mission of episode 8, or even the whole episode at once.
v0.3.0.title: v0.3.0 alpha

Sly 2 Archipelago implementation. For setup instructions, check out the [README](https://github.com/NikolajDanger/APSly2/blob/main/README.md).

## Changes
### Bugs fixes

v0.3.1.title: v0.3.1 alpha

v0.4.0.description:
Sly 2 Archipelago implementation. For setup instructions, check out the [README](https://github.com/NikolajDanger/APSly2/blob/main/README.md).

## Changes
### Features
- Added a `/goal` command to show the goal.
- "Bottlesanity" option.
- Added a "Bottles Collected" counter to the pause menu.
- The items in ThiefNet are scouted now.

### Bug Fixes & Improvements
- A bug where the world wouldn't put Clockwerk parts in the pool has been fixed.
- Jade Decanter and Collectible Plates swapped
- The `/clockwerk_parts` command shows more info now.
v0.4.0.title: v0.4.0 alpha

v0.4.1.description:
Sly 2 Archipelago implementation. For setup instructions, check out the [README](https://github.com/NikolajDanger/APSly2/blob/main/README.md).

## Changes
### Bug Fixes & Improvements
- Fixed randomness so that it actually uses the seed properly
- Fixed "All Bosses" goal
- Fixed the client not being launchable from the command line
- Improved DeathLink messages
v0.4.1.title: v0.4.1 alpha

v0.5.0.description:
Sly 2 Archipelago implementation. For setup instructions, check out the [README](https://github.com/NikolajDanger/APSly2/blob/main/README.md).

## Changes
### Features
- Full Universal Tracker integration with maps.

### Bug Fixes & Improvements
- Fixed several problems with world generation. Sly 2 should stop causing problems during generation now.
- Fixed an isssue where victory would not be sent from the client.
- Partly fixed mega jump being unselected when switching maps.
- Deathlink now works for every health bar.
v0.5.0.title: v0.5.0

v0.6.0.description:
Sly 2 Archipelago implementation. For setup instructions, check out the [README](https://github.com/NikolajDanger/APSly2/blob/main/README.md).

## Changes
### Features
- An option for turning off automatic ThiefNet hints.

### Bug Fixes & Improvements
- Several logic fixes (@Awsomeman328)
- Fixed treasure checks not being registered properly (@Awsomeman328)
- Added manifest file, to ensure compatibility with future versions of Archipelago
v0.6.0.title: v0.6.0

v0.7.0.description:
Sly 2 Archipelago implementation. For setup instructions, check out the [README](https://github.com/NikolajDanger/APSly2/blob/main/README.md).

## Changes
### Features
- Added checks for pickpocketing (@Awsomeman328)
- Added the Time Rush gadget as an item (@Awsomeman328)

### Bug Fixes & Improvements
- Hopefully (🤞) fixed the problem where the game fails to load
- The client now checks what version the world was generated with, to make troubleshooting easier
- Universal Tracker will now properly display ThiefNet checks as "in logic", even when they are hidden from the normal world generator to make generation more spread out.
v0.7.0.title: v0.7.0

v0.8.0.description:
Sly 2 Archipelago implementation. For setup instructions, check out the [README](https://github.com/NikolajDanger/APSly2/blob/main/README.md).

## Changes
### Features
- Added built-in Universal Tracker. If you have the [Universal Tracker](https://github.com/FarisTheAncient/Archipelago/releases/latest) apworld installed, the Sly 2 client should have "Tracker" and "Map" tabs.
- New goal: All Vaults.
- You can now randomize the pick-pocketing loot tables.
- You can also set the rate at which guards have pick-pocketable loot.
- Added "permissive yaml" option. This lets you toggle whether the generation fails when your options are incompatible, or if it quietly changes them.

### Bug Fixes & Improvements
- "All Bosses" goal now works as expected, even when using collect.
- Fixed the issue where you get stuck trying to load your save.
- Changed an error type so that the fuzzer will ignore problems that arise from having too many items.
v0.8.0.title: v0.8.0
